rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with natural light and minimalistic decor, aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large living area with eco-friendly materials, ample sunlight through large windows positioned in the east direction as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Sustainable design dining space adjacent to the kitchen for ease of access.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, energy-efficient kitchen with natural ventilation and eco-friendly appliances, placed in a north-western corner.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with attached bathroom. Placed towards the north for optimum light and tranquility.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom located on the west side, ensuring privacy and Vastu compliance by avoiding direct alignment with the main entrance.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom designed to accommodate visitors, placed in a quiet corner of the ground floor.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Separate servant's quarters with kitchenette and bathroom. Strategically located on the west side ensuring privacy and ease of service access.

rooms.name: Storage & Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for storage and utilities, designed to be eco-friendly with sustainable building materials.

openings.location: North and east walls to maximize natural light
East corner, with a covered pathway to maintain eco-friendly water circulation.
